Name: PRIMARY
Description: EPRV Standard FITS HEADER (no data)

Name: INSTRUMENT_HEADER
Description: Primary header of native NEID instrument file

Name: RECEIPT
Description: The list of operations performed on this file

Name: DRP_CONFIG
Description: Pipeline details to go from the raw file to this file

Name: EXT_DESCRIPT
Description: Contains the description of all the extensions in the file

Name: ORDER_TABLE
Description: Table of echelle order information

Name: TRACE1_FLUX
Description: Flux in Trace 1 NEID MODE FIBER1 fiber

Name: TRACE1_WAVE
Description: Wavelength in Trace 1 NEID MODE FIBER1 fiber

Name: TRACE1_VAR
Description: Flux variance in Trace 1 NEID MODE FIBER1 fiber

Name: TRACE1_BLAZE
Description: Blaze in Trace 1 NEID MODE FIBER1 fiber

Name: TRACE2_FLUX
Description: Flux in Trace 2 NEID MODE FIBER2 fiber

Name: TRACE2_WAVE
Description: Wavelength in Trace 2 NEID MODE FIBER2 fiber

Name: TRACE2_VAR
Description: Flux variance in Trace 2 NEID MODE FIBER2 fiber

Name: TRACE2_BLAZE
Description: Blaze in Trace 2 NEID MODE FIBER2 fiber

Name: TRACE3_FLUX
Description: Flux in Trace 3 NEID MODE FIBER3 fiber

Name: TRACE3_WAVE
Description: Wavelength in Trace 3 NEID MODE FIBER3 fiber

Name: TRACE3_VAR
Description: Flux variance in Trace 3 NEID MODE FIBER3 fiber

Name: TRACE3_BLAZE
Description: Blaze in Trace 3 NEID MODE FIBER3 fiber

Name: BARYCORR_KMS
Description: Barycentric correction velocity per order in km/s

Name: BARYCORR_Z
Description: Barycentric correction velocity per order in redshift (z)

Name: BJD_TDB
Description: Photon weighted midpoint per order as barycentric dynamical time (JD)

Name: TRACE1_DRIFT
Description: Instrument drift velocity relative to start of observing session in km/s

Name: EXPMETER
Description: Chromatic exposure meter for Trace 1 science fiber

Name: TRACE1_TELLURIC
Description: Telluric model for Trace 1 science fiber (line and continuum absorption combined)
